name: realtime-collaborative-editor
description: A production-ready real-time collaborative editing application with Svelte 5, Yjs, WebRTC, and WebSocket

scripts.reset: npm run clean && docker system prune -f
scripts.setup: cp .env.example .env && echo 'Environment file created. Please edit .env with your configuration.'
scripts.health: npm run health:ws && npm run health:signaling
scripts.health:ws: curl -f http://localhost:1234/health || echo 'WebSocket server not healthy'
scripts.health:signaling: curl -f http://localhost:3001/health || echo 'Signaling server not healthy'
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:server && npm run install:signaling
